attributes.action: I want all EU trade deals/agreements published in all UK newspapers.
attributes.background: I want details of all agreements with the EU published regularly in national newspapers in the UK. I want independant economists to scutinise those agreements and question MPs, on why those decisions were made if they are not fair or detrimental to the British people or our economy.

rejection.details: This would be a decision for newspaper editors, not the UK Government or Parliament.
